name: AntiVirus_snake
description: Dr. Danil developed an anti-virus snake to help clean the computers of Danil's clients from viruses. You will play as that very antivirus snake. In the game you have to go through various obstacles and neutralize the soldiers of the virus. It is necessary to interact with the mechanisms on the locations in order to move through the location, it is also necessary to build up the cyber snake so that it can open access to the next task. The player should use the environment of the level to the maximum so as not to die and not to relax and think over their actions.
